title: Example: Revenue Impact from AI Platform
content: Led development of an AI-powered recommendation engine that increased customer retention by 15%, translating to $2.3M annual revenue impact. Built on AWS SageMaker with custom feature engineering pipeline processing 50M+ daily events.

title: Example: Healthcare AI Regulatory Knowledge
content: Deep expertise in HIPAA-compliant ML pipelines, FDA Software as a Medical Device (SaMD) guidelines, and CMS interoperability rules. Designed data governance frameworks adopted across three healthcare organizations.

title: Example: Real-Time ML Inference Platform
content: Architected a real-time ML inference platform serving 10,000+ predictions/second with p99 latency under 50ms. Used Kubernetes, Istio service mesh, and custom model serving framework. Reduced infrastructure costs by 40% compared to previous batch-processing approach.

title: Example: Engineering Team Growth
content: Grew AI engineering team from 3 to 12 engineers over 18 months. Established technical interview process, mentorship program, and architecture review board. Team achieved 95% sprint velocity consistency and zero critical production incidents for 6 consecutive months.

title: Example: Pipeline Reliability Improvement
content: Reduced data pipeline failures from 12% to under 1% by implementing idempotent processing, dead-letter queues, and automated retry with exponential backoff. Saved 20+ engineering hours per week previously spent on manual intervention.
